original: Årmann, Raoul Nils Alvar, överste, Jönköping, f. 28/11/95 i Stora Mellö-sa, Örebro 1., av godsäg. Nils A. o. Alva Lange. G. 22 m. grev:an Eva Wachtmeister, d. 47. Barn: Ulla f. 23’, g. m. ’hovr lassess. T. Ahlgren, Elisabeth 25, Gunilla 31. — Stud:ex. i Örebro 13. Fänrik v. Smål. art:reg. 15, löjtn. 18, v. artistaben 26, kapt. v. Bodens art:reg. 28, major v. artistabs-kåren 37, övilöjtn. 39, överste 41, stabschef v. art:insp. 40, chef f. Smål. art:reg. sed. 42. Adjut. h. H. K. H. Kronprinsen. KS02kl, RVO, CFBSM, Jönk. 1. bfbSM, LKrVA.
translated: Årmann, Raoul Nils Alvar, Colonel, Jönköping, born November 28, 1895 in Stora Mellö-sa, Örebro County, son of landowner Nils A. and Alva Lange. Married in 1922 to Countess Eva Wachtmeister, who passed away in 1947. Children: Ulla, born in 1923, married to Court Assessor T. Ahlgren, Elisabeth, born in 1925, Gunilla, born in 1931. Completed high school in Örebro in 1913. Enlisted as an Ensign in the Småland Artillery Regiment in 1915, promoted to Lieutenant in 1918, transferred to the Artillery Staff Corps in 1926, promoted to Captain in the Boden Artillery Regiment in 1928, Major in the Artillery Staff Corps in 1937, promoted to Lieutenant Colonel in 1939, Colonel in 1941, served as Chief of Staff in the Artillery Inspectorate from 1940 and as the commander of the Småland Artillery Regiment since 1942. Adjutant to His Royal Highness the Crown Prince. Recipient of the Knight of the Order of the Sword of the Second Class, Royal Victorian Order, Commander of the Order of the Cross of the North Star, Jönköping First Brigade's Field Battery Silver Medal, and Commander of the Order of Vasa.

award.name: Knight of the Order of the Sword
Order of the Cross of the North Star
Jönköping First Brigade's Field Battery Silver Medal
